item.title: Getting Started
item.description: TODO Now That you know how to do things, feel free to get better acquainted with your new parsing buddy.

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Getting Started With Sherpa Well, no time like the present to get started! Check this out, Run in Lab <> A > "hello" "world" Cool huh, you’ll notice we are now in the Sherpa “lab”. Note: these documents are integrated with Sherpa lab. Whenever you see the (TODO: Beaker symbol), you can click on it to open the lab to start experimenting with the related subject. Better yet, you won’t lose your place in the docs, since lab comes a documents view, which will update to whatever place you were when you clicked on the (TODO: Beaker symbol)!

item.title: Sherpa Grammar
item.description: Repeating Characters (+) & (+<symbol>) - One or more (*) & (*<symbol>) - Zero or more ? - Optional
